name: bushbaby/flysystem
description: Laminas Framework module bridge for flysystem filesystem.

suggest.laminas/laminas-filter: laminas-filter component ^2.9.1, if you need RenameUpload filter
suggest.laminas/laminas-modulemanager: Use as a Laminas Framework module
suggest.league/flysystem-path-prefixing: Use to scope down any filesystem adapter to a prefixed path
suggest.league/flysystem-read-only: Turn any Flysystem adapter into a read only adapter
suggest.league/flysystem-ftp: FTP adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp-v3: SFTP adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Aws S3 adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-async-aws-s3: Aws Async S3 adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-azure-blob-storage: Azure Blob Storage adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-google-cloud-storage: Google Cloud Storage adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-webdav: Webdav adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.league/flysystem-memory: In memory adapter for use with Flysystem
suggest.ajgl/flysystem-replicate: Replicate adapter for use with Flysystem
